channel.title: Does anyone know where to add a point system to castle wars?
channel.description: Now this might be noobish, but I just added castle wars after this guide [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,462243.0.html]https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,462243.0.html[/url] yet I want to make it where you get 1 point if you lose and 2 points if you win, but don't really know where to added that at. Can someone help me locate to add it? I know you need to declare the point system so your server can save it to your character, yet i need to know where do I add the point system to the castle wars game

item.title: Does anyone know where to add a point system to castle wars?
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

You followed a Guide. Use a Math Statement next to where it extracts the Players from the Minigame and sends them a Message based upon the outcome (win/loss).

Read full topic
item.source: Does anyone know where to add a point system to castle wars?
